 1999-05791999-03-250,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisApproval of the designation by the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization of JOE GEURTS, an officer of the Museum, to act as the Director of Canadian Museum of Civilization until the appointment of a Director, effective April 1, 1999.
